mapper.insert: insert into tbl_chatroom_user(ROOMID, USERID, REGDATE) values (LAST_INSERT_ID(), (select id from tbl_user where email=#{loginEmail}), NOW()), (LAST_INSERT_ID(), (select id from tbl_user where nickname=#{userNickname}), NOW());
mapper.select:
select c.roomid as id , group_concat(p.nickname separator '|') as usersNickname , group_concat(p.profilephoto separator '|') as usersPhoto , m.comment as lastMessage , m.sendtime as lastMessageDate
from (select roomid from tbl_chatroom_user where userid=#{userid} order by regdate) c join (select * from tbl_chatroom_user where userid!=#{userid}) u on c.roomid = u.roomid join tbl_user p on u.userid = p.id left join (select * from tbl_message order by sendtime desc limit 1) m on c.roomid = m.roomid group by c.roomid
